channel.title: Products on GID LLC
channel.description: Recent content in Products on GID LLC

item.title: ESE Lightning Protection
item.description: We offer a range of products from a number of manufacturers: Duval-Messien, Protart and Dameks. All products conform to NFC17-102. StormSat® ESE from Duval Messien, France Features: Intelligent static generator able to ground both +ve and –ve strikes equally and simultaneously E-counter and e-analysis of lightning strikes Advance information regarding storm activity Information regarding lightning activity and Lightning current Information regarding lightning risk evolution

item.title: Terec +
item.description: Terec+ is the latest solution for safe and permanent earthing and complies with IEEE 80:2000, clause 14.5.d. The compound sharply reduces soil resistivity and does not require periodic maintenance ensuring safety and peace of mind. Miracle compound consisting of rare natural composites Highly Electrically & Thermally conductive Achieves resistance acceptable to any international body or local authorities (e.g. MEDC, OETC) Saves delicate electrical and electronic and mechanical equipment from ground faults

item.title: Exothermic Welding
item.description: thermOweld® exothermic welding materials and accessories products, provide a simple, efficient, cost effective method of permanently connecting two or more conductors utilizing a high temperature exothermic reaction between Aluminum and Copper Oxide to produce an almost pure copper weld.

item.title: LED Lighthing
item.description: DURALITE products are painstakingly designed to reflect the class and finesse of the Italian design which has always been a symbol of style and quality. DURALITE makes innovation and progress in accordance to the most updated International standard and regulation. All DURALITE products are CE marked. Key Features Anti-Corrosion: Resistant to any atmospheric agent UV Stabilized: Protected from long-term UV degeneration effects No Maintenance: The colour is the paste of the material so painting not necessary Double Insulation: Electrically earthed High Specific Weight Heavy and Strong material Elegant style and Smooth Finish

item.title: UV Disinfection
item.description: We offer a range of products for UV Disinfection providing up to 99.999% protection from Lokozo Technologies Pvt. Ltd. Lokozo is an Indian product designer and manufacturer especially on LED lights, solar power and allied technologies. LOKOZO offers an array of solution for UVC Disinfection and thrives to provide the best in class energy efficient product range.
